page.title: 13HOME LIFE An adult's day
page.content: An average day for me starts with my getting up first.I cook breakfast for my husband and make his packed lunch. I then cook my two sons' breakfast. It may be a day to get the washing machine out.Making the beds fits in between hanging out the washing.Our dog requires an hours walk.At the beginning and end of the working week I clean the house right through.I also make all our bread once a week. Most household and food shopping I buy once a fortnight in the nearest large town. I may visit a friend. The boys are home about 4 p.m. and I cook the evening meal for 6-6.30 p.m. One night a week I play badminton at a local club.I do typing and the financial books for my husband's business.I usually watch the television other evenings, perhaps whilst knitting.(Mrs.Georgina Darling)
